title: Job Relocating You to Atlanta?  Lease Purchase- Try Before You Buy!
posting_body: Contact me today to learn more about an innovative Lease with Right to Purchase program.
Unlike many rent to own programs or lease options, there is no obligation to buy and no
You actually get to choose the home you want from available homes on the market FOR SALE.
** Once you're approved and have chosen a home, all you need is just
2 months refundable security deposit and 1st month lease payment.
• Minimum 620 TransUnion FICO score ( soft pull) and must have verifiable income.
• No history of eviction or other landlord issues
For more information, call or text me today!
I'd love to tell you more.
***Photo in the ad is for illustration purposes only!
